text.div:
Generated Narrative: ConceptMap R5-Linkage-element-map-to-R4

Mapping from http://hl7.org/fhir/5.0 to http://hl7.org/fhir/4.0


Group 1 Mapping from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Linkage|5.0.0 to Linkageversion: 4.0.1)

Source CodeRelationshipTarget CodeComment
Linkage.meta (meta)is equivalent toElement `Linkage.meta` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Linkage.meta`, but has no comparisons.
Linkage.implicitRules (implicitRules)is equivalent toElement `Linkage.implicitRules` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Linkage.implicitRules`, but has no comparisons.
Linkage.language (language)is equivalent toElement `Linkage.language` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Linkage.language`, but has no comparisons.
Linkage.text (text)is equivalent toElement `Linkage.text` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Linkage.text`, but has no comparisons.
Linkage.contained (contained)is equivalent toElement `Linkage.contained` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Linkage.contained`, but has no comparisons.
Linkage.active (active)is equivalent toElement `Linkage.active` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Linkage.active`, but has no comparisons.
Linkage.author (author)is equivalent toElement `Linkage.author` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Linkage.author`, but has no comparisons.
Linkage.item (item)maps to wider conceptElement `Linkage.item` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Linkage.item`, but has no comparisons.
Linkage.item.type (type)is equivalent toElement `Linkage.item.type` is part of an existing definition because parent element `Linkage.item` requires a cross-version extension. Element `Linkage.item.type` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Linkage.item.type`, but has no comparisons.
Linkage.item.resource (resource)is equivalent toElement `Linkage.item.resource` is part of an existing definition because parent element `Linkage.item` requires a cross-version extension. Element `Linkage.item.resource` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Linkage.item.resource`, but has no comparisons.

Group 2 Mapping from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Linkage|5.0.0 to Extensions for Using Data Elements from FHIR R5 in FHIR R4

Source CodeRelationshipTarget CodeComment
Linkage.item (item)is equivalent tohttp://hl7.org/fhir/5.0/StructureDefinition/extension-Linkage.itemElement `Linkage.item` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Linkage.item`, but has no comparisons.
Linkage.item.type (type)is equivalent tohttp://hl7.org/fhir/5.0/StructureDefinition/extension-Linkage.item.typeElement `Linkage.item.type` is part of an existing definition because parent element `Linkage.item` requires a cross-version extension. Element `Linkage.item.type` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Linkage.item.type`, but has no comparisons.
Linkage.item.resource (resource)is equivalent tohttp://hl7.org/fhir/5.0/StructureDefinition/extension-Linkage.item.resourceElement `Linkage.item.resource` is part of an existing definition because parent element `Linkage.item` requires a cross-version extension. Element `Linkage.item.resource` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Linkage.item.resource`, but has no comparisons.

name: R5LinkageElementMapToR4
title: Cross-version mapping for FHIR R5 Linkage to FHIR R4 Linkage
description: This ConceptMap represents cross-version mappings for elements from a FHIR R5 Linkage to FHIR R4.

target.comment: Element `Linkage.meta` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Linkage.meta`, but has no comparisons.
Element `Linkage.implicitRules` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Linkage.implicitRules`, but has no comparisons.
Element `Linkage.language` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Linkage.language`, but has no comparisons.
Element `Linkage.text` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Linkage.text`, but has no comparisons.
Element `Linkage.contained` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Linkage.contained`, but has no comparisons.
Element `Linkage.active` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Linkage.active`, but has no comparisons.
Element `Linkage.author` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Linkage.author`, but has no comparisons.
Element `Linkage.item` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Linkage.item`, but has no comparisons.

Element `Linkage.item.type` is part of an existing definition because parent element `Linkage.item` requires a cross-version extension.
Element `Linkage.item.type` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Linkage.item.type`, but has no comparisons.

Element `Linkage.item.resource` is part of an existing definition because parent element `Linkage.item` requires a cross-version extension.
Element `Linkage.item.resource` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Linkage.item.resource`, but has no comparisons.
Element `Linkage.item` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Linkage.item`, but has no comparisons.

Element `Linkage.item.type` is part of an existing definition because parent element `Linkage.item` requires a cross-version extension.
Element `Linkage.item.type` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Linkage.item.type`, but has no comparisons.

Element `Linkage.item.resource` is part of an existing definition because parent element `Linkage.item` requires a cross-version extension.
Element `Linkage.item.resource` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Linkage.item.resource`, but has no comparisons.
